attributes.action: Get the 'UK' out of the 'EU' NOW
attributes.additional_details:
Lots of evidence in posts and post comments on the following sites/pages that prove "WE ALL WANT OUT".

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Get-Britain-out-of-the-EU/126795804185461

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Get-Britain-OUT-of-the-EU/136101146405483

https://www.facebook.com/BritainOut

https://www.facebook.com/GetBritainOut
attributes.background:
The UK Citizens have had enough of the EU and the EU pushing us round and bullying us to do what the EU want us to do.

UK Citizens don't wish to wait until 2017 for an IN/OUT referendum that may never come.

100.000 signatures guarantees a debate in parliament
